name: Red Book: Discordia Tales
description:
Red Book: Discordia tales is total remake game of a puzzle horror-adventure game made by NewbieMaker.

The game is focused on exploration and puzzle-solving.
There are no battles and the story is a little bit vague.
Same as the old game It has only one ending.

Play as Alice as she tries to get out from the dark world by an unknown entity.
